case.name: Secretary, Department of Family and Community Servicesv Wall [2006] FCA 863 (7 July 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: whether respondents had effectively alienated beneficial ownership of real property in favour of their son where no transfer of legal title
whether proprietary estoppel in circumstances where son made substantial improvements to the property
whether relief confined to reversal of detriment
relevance of other appropriate remedies and of third party interests to measure of relief.
